Description: Conical foot sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style patterned, pottery chalice with part of bowl; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black in bottom of bowl; exterior: reserved on bowl and partly on foot; wide and streaky black band on outside of foot; inscription on reserved underside.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding squat patterned chalices, see Lemos no. 1062 from Kamiros.
Bibliographic references: Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (p. 171, no. 66)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0907) (phase 2)
